snippet.title: Diluvian Winds - Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out gameplay, building elements, and more in this latest Diluvian Winds trailer. This building and management game is headed to Early Access on PC via Steam and GOG in Q3 2022.

In Diluvian Winds, take on the role of the Guardian, the stubborn keeper of the lighthouse who refuses to leave despite the threats of the angry storms and high waves causing a mass exodus of a coastal village. Take in anthropomorphic evacuees and build a community around the lighthouse surrounded by rising waters.

#IGN #Gaming
